Q_DESC: There is a country which is infected by virus. It has many cities and some cities are connected to other cities. In order to prevent virus from spreading Panda plans on destroying the connection between all the cities. Panda has got a power called pimogio. Using this power he can destroy any city, which results in destruction of all connections from this city. For destroying one city, Panda requires one unit pimogio power. Panda's final aim is to isolate all the cities. In order to do so, Panda follows a simple approach, he keeps on destroying the city with most number of connections in it at that moment.
